English: local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera `越劇~|`越~剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera `川劇~|`川~剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera `豫劇~|`豫~剧[Yu4 ju4] etc

d.f: `流行~`在~`某~`一~`特定~`地區~，`而~`以~`當地~`方言~`演唱~，`具有~`鄉土~`色彩~`的~`戲劇~。`如~`秦腔~、`川劇~、`越劇~、`歌仔戲~。

English: local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera `越劇~|`越~剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera `川劇~|`川~剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera `豫劇~|`豫~剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
